channel.title: CVE Feed for Themeum -- WP Crowdfunding
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themeum -- WP Crowdfunding

item.title: CVE-2023-50859|2024-08-02T22:23:44.216Z -- themeum -- wp%20crowdfunding
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themeum WP Crowdfunding allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Crowdfunding: from n/a through 2.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-47532|2024-08-02T21:09:37.379Z -- themeum -- wp%20crowdfunding
